Title: Fact Finding
Description:
I must speak with the Primalists. I don't understand why she would turn her back on us.
 
Koroleth saved my life at Teldrassil. I owe it to her to find out the truth.
 
$n, I realize this might be awkward, but will you help me? I can no longer bear this alone.
ObjectivesText: Meet Kelestra at the Twilight Watchtower.
